.. _dir_include_microphysics:


Directory microphysics
======================


|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Parent directory <dir_include>` (``include``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS

*Directory path:* ``include/microphysics``
